title: RaccoonTV
description: A full-stack Netflix clone, featuring user registration, profile customization, dynamic multimedia content feeds, and advanced search functionalities.

title: AI-Sensei 3D Japanese Tutor
description: An immersive 3D Japanese language learning platform featuring real-time text-to-speech with animated virtual teachers and grammar breakdowns.

title: FindFlora
description: A Java-based recommendation engine using machine learning techniques and QuadTree algorithms to offer personalized garden solutions.

title: Task2Calendar
description: A light-weighted Chrome Extension that clips tasks from web pages directly to your calendar with one single click.

title: TimeToGoal
description: A time-tracking iOS app that combines short-term task planning and long-term goal tracking to help users stay focused.
